home.description: My name is Pedro, I'm a developer with more than 2 years of experience  building  for the web.
home.skills-text: Using the latest tech this world has to offer

experiences.dialog-text-1: I studied hardware for 2 years and then I started working building PC's and doing maintenance
experiences.dialog-text-2: This is where I started to change careers, but I continued working with computers, I studied for 2 years before starting to work as a developer.
experiences.dialog-text-3: Now. I work as a freelancer doing different types of work like complete websites and apps using all the technologies alongside

project.subtitle: Here is my latest project and some information about it
project.info-text-1: This Next.js e-commerce project is built using React, TypeScript, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. It features a dynamic product catalog fetched from an API, with functionalities like filtering based on categories, brands, and prices. The Redux store manages the global state, ensuring seamless updates across components.
project.info-text-2: Tailwind CSS is used for responsive, modern UI design. The app includes pages for product listings, detailed product views, shopping cart, and checkout, with real-time updates and optimized performance for a smooth user experience across devices.
